source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 17,586 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description:
Blast your target with a ball of concentrated flame, dealing 150 Fire damage to an enemy or healing an ally for 150, then burn the target for an additional 75% of the damage or healing done over 6 sec.

Each cast of Concentrated Flame deals 100% increased damage or healing. This bonus resets after every third cast.
Max 2 Charges.

passive_spell_tooltip.description: Your spells and abilities have a chance to cauterize your target for 398 Fire damage over 10 sec or to heal an ally for 398 over 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Reduces the cooldown of Aspect of the Wild by 10.0%.

When you activate Aspect of the Wild, immediately heal for 5% of maximum health.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to refund 50% of the Focus spent on them and heal you for 107.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase you and 2 other allies' Haste by 5 for 8 sec and reduce the cooldown of you and 2 other allies' currently slotted Major Essence by 1.0 sec.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Hidden Shoulder
Hidden Shoulder

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 80 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 20,182 Agility for 15 sec.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
